    • nodeHoverEffectWithPersistence

      protected static void nodeHoverEffectWithPersistence​(javafx.scene.Node node, javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty persistence)
      Method that allows you to apply a hover effect, with persistence if needed, to a specified node
      Parameters:
      node - the node you want to apply the effect to
      persistence - if persistence is true, keep the effect applied even when not hover

    • applyEffectBinding

      private static void applyEffectBinding​(javafx.scene.Node node, javafx.scene.effect.Effect effect, javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty property)
      Applies a binding to the effect property of the specified node. When property is true, the effect is applied, otherwise it is removed
      Parameters:
      node - node to which apply the effect
      effect - effect to be applied
      property - property to monitor for changes

    • nodeHoverEffect

      protected static void nodeHoverEffect​(javafx.scene.Node node)
      Adds an hover effect to the given node. Effect is an "highlight effect"
      Parameters:
      node - node to which apply the effect

      Method that allows you to make slideInDown animation to a specified node

      node - the node you want to apply the slide in down animation
